content.p: At The University of Nottingham we realise how difficult it can be to juggle parenthood with your career or your studies. We offer an excellent range of childcare services for students and staff of the University to make life with us as easy as possible. There are various grants and discount schemes available, subject to eligibility. For further information please visit the Childcare Services website. The University has set up a small fund to offer eligible students financial assistance towards childcare. For further information on this scheme please visit the Student Services website.
